parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
To do that which is good. From agathopoios; to be a well-doer.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
To do harm, do wrong, do evil, commit sin. From kakopoios; to be a bad-doer, i.e. to injure, or to sin.
To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To keep silence, be silent, either voluntarily or involuntarily. From siope; to be dumb; figuratively, to be calm.
